messages.title: THE FACTS ABOUT THE TORY PLAN:
messages.content: Cut Child Benefit, leaving 4 million families over £1,000 worse off. Cut Tax Credits, making over 4 million families worse off. Scrap Tax Credits entirely for parents with two children and a joint income over £29,000.

messages.title: LABOUR HAS A BETTER PLAN:
messages.content: Protect Child Benefit. Raise Tax Credits in line with inflation every year. Increase the Minimum Wage to £8 an hour. Guarantee 25 hours free childcare.
Working families can't afford five more years of the Tories. Staying at home or voting for any other party risks letting the Tories in. Vote Labour to put working families first.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Raise Tax Credits in line with inflation every year
Increase the Minimum Wage to £8 an hour

mentions.tacticalSituation: Working families can't afford five more years of the Tories. Staying at home or voting for any other party risks letting the Tories in.

Scrap Tax Credits entirely for parents with two children and a joint income over £29,000. LABOUR HAS A BETTER PLAN: Protect Child Benefit. Raise Tax Credits in line with inflation every year.

contactInformation.address: c/o Potts Print (UK), Atlas House, Nelson Park, Cramlington, Northumberland NE23 1WG

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is an official promotion by the Labour Party endorsing their policies and contrasting them with the policies of the Conservative Party (Tories), urging voters to vote Labour to prioritize working families.
